participant_1.background:
I am a graduate student trying to manage my anxiety disorder.
my favorite movie genre is horror.
i am a mother of two.
I value my fitness tracker most of all, because it helps me stay active and healthy.
i do not have a car.

participant_2.background:
I find it relaxing to create beautiful things with my hands.
I have a van that has a lot of room for my cooking supplies and equipment, and for when I'm traveling.
i love starbucks coffee.
i am one of four children.
I like to take care of my body and mind, but I don't let my appearance get in the way of my passions.

content.text: Hi! What is your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love to cook and bake, and I have a van that I use to travel and bring my supplies with me.
That sounds really neat! I love to cook, too. Do you have any favorite dishes to make?
I love making pasta dishes, especially lasagna. I also love baking sourdough bread.
That sounds delicious! I don't have a lot of time to cook, but I do love making coffee.
I love Starbucks coffee, too! I always get a venti vanilla latte.
I love that! I usually get a venti caramel macchiato.
That sounds delicious! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who shares your interests.
Yes, it is! I'm glad I met you.
